Items.Name: Full Length Russian Black Mink CAPE Mint NR
Items.Description: if (navigator.appName == 'Microsoft Internet Explorer') { if (navigator.appVersion.substring(0,1) "); } else { document.write(" "); document.write(" "); document.write(" BODY { background: url(http://members.aol.com/slashsheri/dawnxmasanglesbackground.jpg) }"); document.write(" "); document.write(" "); } } else { //Default to Netscape settings. document.write(" "); } Full Length Russian Black Mink CAPE Mint NR Have Patience Enlarged Pictures to show Detail Welcome to an Treasure Grove Antiques & Uniques Auction For some lucky lady I have for sale a fabulous full length cape. This glorious coat was purchased from the estate of Barbara Dunne here in Cincinnati. Barbara was Miss Cincinnati in 1947, and went on to be a super model in New York. This was made for her for a photo shoot, there are no labels of the furrier in the lining, just her initials (from another marriage) and embroidering on both sides. I would say the vintage because of the style is late 1950's to early 1960's. This could of only been worn a few times, it is in like new condition.. The velvet lined hood feels soooo luxurious on and has a hidden snap for when you just want to use it as a collar. This cape will fit a size 9-10 on down to a 7-8, with minimum height of 5'4" tall...Thats me.....From the back at the bottom of the hood seam to the bottom it measures 48" long. The very dramatic sweep measures 81", the hood stands another 14" and is 9" wide. There are two hidden slits for your arms, with the inner straps in the lining, and one hook on the folded down color, which when latched will cover the entire neckline, I show it open..... In Pristine condition, Barbara had a "Vault" in New York where she kept her many furs. In the photos there shows some white, this was very hard to photograph. There are absolutely no bare spots or drying to the fur. It is as if it were brand new....Better...they don't make anything like this now in mink. Capes are very big this year, along with fur. This is one of a kind. This Russian Black Mink is of high quality, with barely a hint of brown to it, so well made you can't tell where one pelt ends and another starts. It appears to be one large piece...And unlike most " black minks" it is not dyed.. This takes your breath away, and the fur simply glows.... Be the lucky lady wearing this New Years Eve If you see a little red X instead of picture Right Click on it and click on "Show Picture" ....it's " AOL".... MORE PICTURES BELOW THERE'S NO RESERVE, SO BID EARLY.... TERMS BEFORE BIDDING Winning bidder agrees to pay for Priority Shipping Plus Insurance. Depending on the size of the piece there may be a small amount added for shipping supplies," we do not try to make money off of shipping charges". We prefer check, or Postal M/O, or Bill Point Electronic Check, payment to be made within 7 days of close of auction. Credit card payment can be made with Visa, Master Card, or Discover, through our Shop, you may call at (513) 737-5535. Checks will hold shipping item for up to 10 days, M/O will ship within 2 days.**International bidders must Email for shipping cost. Sorry only International Postal Money Orders, are accepted from some countries. RETURN POLICY BEFORE BIDDING Please bid with confidence, " Treasure Grove Antiques " has an excellent reputation in the Tri State area, and are known for our honesty and quality merchandise. We guarantee the items to be as described, and will only accept returns if that rare occasion arises that we have failed to describe the item accurately. You must contact us for return instructions within two (2) days (by phone or email) of receipt of your item(s). Upon our receipt and inspection of the returned item(s), we will issue a refund for your item(s) if returned in the same condition as it was when it was sent to you, excluding shipping/insurance costs. Buyer is responsible for the same return shipping/insurance costs, as it was originaly shipped by seller, which will not be reimbursed for any reason. Returned merchandise must be received by us within seven (7) days of the date from which you contact us regarding the return. We DO NOT refund for Buyers Remorse...... Please click below to email us with any questions before bidding Feel Free To E-Mail Us To insure winning this item **** BID NOW **** " Good Luck " Thank You Sheri & Rick We buy quality pieces in the Art Deco, Art Nouveau , Victorian period and of course alot of Czech jewels.....I love the "Fru Fru" and Rick leans towards the pottery, glassware and furniture. So as you can see we buy it all. If you have any special requests do not hesitate to email........... Thank You for your Business........ This listing created by eBay Seller's Assistant Basic.
